name: Gnome More Running
description:
Gnome More Running is my first official game and as such it's pretty simple!

I originally intended it to be a mobile game, but that didn't happen and I wanted to follow through with it anyways.

You play as Gnomie the ultra-marathoner. Jump over or blow up the blocks in your way!

Controls:

1: Ice

2: Fire

3: FIST

Space bar: Jump
